description: Too much gear for the loops on your harness? Prefer to reach that essential cam with either hand? This is an ergonomic sling that feels good on the skin and disperses the load of your gear well. Doubling back the buckle gives you loop strength of 10kN, so your gear will definitely not come off!Fully adjustable - one size fits all.Wicking polyester fabric on underside.Offset curve design hugs shoulder well.Precision die-cut foam padding.
name: Black Diamond Padded Gear Sling
